items.name: merchant_email
items.title: Merchant E-Mail
items.tooltip: Please enter the merchant e-mail address used to sign up with PayPal

items.name: sandbox_merchant_email
items.title: Sandbox Merchant E-Mail
items.tooltip: Please enter the merchant e-mail address used to sign up with PayPal Sandbox

items.name: faliure_attempt
items.title: Re-attempt Failed Recurring Payments
items.tooltip: This option determines if the failed recurring payment should be re-attempt (As paypal will re-attept after 3 days after recurring payment failure)

items.name: charset
items.title: Website Language Encoding
items.tooltip: Determines the language of the website encoding system that is used when data is transferred to PayPal for payment process.
